title.narrative: 4.3 : PREPAREDNESS AND RESPONSE TO CRISIS AND SHOCKS

description.narrative: Communities, households and national and subnational institutions are better prepared to respond to crises and shocks, including those caused by climate change, and to maintain service delivery for affected women and children through systems strengthening., which contributes to Child Health, Child Health (Covid), Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development (Covid), Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews (Covid), Disaster Risk Reduction, Disaster Risk Reduction (Covid), Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Operations Support To Programme Delivery (Covid), Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas (Covid), Sanitation, Social Protection, Social Protection (Covid), Water, Water (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Harnessing Power Of Business And Markets, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, United Nations Working Together. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Girls and boys live in more-inclusive and resilient communities strengthened by an enabling environment and systems that createequitable chances in life.

sector.narrative: Cash Transfers: Delivery of cash transfers through government system (beneficiary identification, grievance mechanisms, cash delivery mechanisms like banking, mobiles, community distribution)

Public health emergencies, including disease outbreaks
Risk informed Programming for resilience (including policy and strategy development)
Social protection and welfare services policy, planning and administration
Strengthening C4D in Government systems including preparedness for humanitarian action
WASH - risk informed programming including climate resilience disaster and conflict
